comments.comment:
chorus (x2)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c2

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
A
Eternal God unchanging
mysterious and unknown
Your boundless love unfailing
in grace and mercy shown

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Bright seraphim in ceaseless flight
around Your glorious throne
They raise their voices day and night
in praise to You alone

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah
Glory be to our Great God
Hallelujah
Glory be to our Great God

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Lord we are weak and frail
Helpless in the storm
Surround us with Your angels
hold us in Your arms

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Our cold and ruthless enemy
his pleasure is our harm
Rise up O Lord and he will flee
before our Sovereign God

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Let ev'ry creature in the sea
and ev'ry flying bird
let ev'ry mountain ev'ry field
and valley of the earth

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Let all the moons and all the stars
in all the universe
sing praises to the Living God
Who rules them by His Word

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Hallelujah
(sisters echo)
Glory be to our Great God
(sisters echo: Glory to our God)
Hallelujah
(sisters echo)
Glory be to our Great God
(sisters echo: Glory to our God)
